package.name: pdflib
package.summary: Creating PDF on the fly with the PDFlib library
package.description:
This extension wraps the PDFlib programming library for processing PDF on the fly, created by Thomas Merz.
PDFlib is available for commercial licensing and under the PDFlib Lite License (see http://www.pdflib.com/products/pdflib/info/PDFlib-Lite-license.pdf).
More info on how to use PDFlib with PHP can be found at http://www.pdflib.com/products/pdflib/info/PDFlib-in-PHP-HowTo.pdf.

release.notes: Bugfixes: - fixed Bug http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=3554 - windows build should work now
